title: "Tesla’s AI Dreams May Already Be Priced Into Stock"
excerpt: "After an 82% year-to-date rally, Tesla shares trade at about 61 times forward earnings, compared with the mid-to-high single-digit multiples of auto stalwarts General Motors Co. and Ford Motor Co. Even current AI darling Nvidia Corp. trades at only 42 times."
